name: -webkit-mask-origin
description: Determines where the -webkit-mask-position property is anchored.

border.description: The mask's position is anchored at the upper-left corner of the element's border.

content.description: The mask's position is anchored at the upper-left corner of the element's content.

padding.description: The mask's position is anchored at the upper-left corner of the element's padding.
